name: Reviewer
author: Jeroen Sormani

sections.description:
With Reviewer you can create and manage reviews on your website. With just a few clicks the plugin is installed and you’ll have all you need to get started on writing reviews

No fuzz

The Reviewer core plugin is not meant to be a one-size-fits-all solution. It is pouring the foundation to build a house or even a skyscraper if you’d like.
This means that the plugin is designed to have all the core features you need to start writing and managing reviews, and the ability to extend these features to fit your exact needs.

Beautifully designed and coded

I take great pride in writing beautiful code and that can be seen in the Reviewer plugin. I know users (like you) don’t look at the code / don’t care about it, but this is one of the most important things to build a solid, stable and maintainable plugin. Trust me.

Extensible

Every WordPress site works and looks differently.
looks: By default Reviewer brings you standard looking templates that should fit most themes. Want to up your game? you can override every template and make things look exactly how you want.
works: Need to modify how something works? The plugin is made to be easily extensible, and we have a ton of documentation that will also show how you can accomplish doing so.

Documentation

We’ve extensively written documentation which can be found on https://wpreviewer.com/documentation

Feedback is welcome

Reviewer has launched in Feb 2017, which means that it is still a young plugin. Therefore all feedback, suggestions, feature requests and whatever is on your mind about hte plugin is more then welcome!
If you have something you’d like to share, please feel free to reach out through this form on wpreviewer.com

Extensions

As mentioned the plugin can be extended to include additional valuable features. We’ve created some additional extension that hold the same qualities as the Reviewer plugin does.
View the extensions

Reviewer requires PHP 5.3 or higher

(99.8% of those who read this will meet that requirement)
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder wpreviewer to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the settings page to fine-tune the settings if desired
sections.changelog:
1.0.4 – 2017/08/01

  • [Fix] – Excerpts being escaped on every save
  • [Fix] – Error when using reviews as homepage AND using ‘default’ permalinks setting
  • [Add] – Help tab in the top right corner with helpful text / links
  • [Add] – Integration helper class for extensions

1.0.4 – 2017/08/01

  • [Add] – New review List widget to list top rated, most recent reviews. + taking suggestions.
  • [Fix] – ‘I want this’ links on the ‘Extensions’ page were not working – Sorry! – Please re-submit if interested.

1.0.3 – 2017/04/09

  • [Improvement] – Add check for custom setting tabs – prevents possible error when a custom tab is added.
  • [Improvement] – Small refactor for widgets code – now uses abstract widget
  • [Fix] – Link to documentation on plugins page

1.0.2 – 2017/03/23

  • [Fix] – Error when setting the reviews page on the homepage
  • [Fix] – Error on earlier PHP version (5.3/5.4) on a few template files (“can’t use method return in write context”)

1.0.1 – 2017/02/09

  • [Fix] – The rating value not always loaded properly in the admin

1.0.0 – 2017/02/06

  • Initial release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the folder wpreviewer to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the settings page to fine-tune the settings if desired

short_description: Start creating reviews of the things you love and become a awesome reviewer, with Reviewer
